Liri OS

An OS and apps built with modern design and features Un OS et des applications modernes et design An OS and apps built with modern design and features

Member of this project since the very beginning. We started building small cross-plateform applications, and then merged with the Papyros operating system and Hawaii. Membre du Liri Project depuis le début, quand ce n'était que des petites applications cross-plateform. Nous avons ensuite rejoint les projets Papyros et Hawai pour former Liri OS. Member of this project since the very beginning. We started building small cross-plateform applications, and then merged with the Papyros operating system and Hawaii.
Apps development and design team Dévelopement d'applications et équipe graphique Apps Entwicklung und Design Team
Website Site internet Webseite

EasyFit

A JS library to parse .FIT files easily Une biblotheque JS pour lire les fichiers .FIT facilement Eine JS-Bibliothek um .FIT einfach zu lesen

There was no direct way to parse .FIT activities file from Javascript, so I decided to look into it and turned a prototype I found into a modern library, packaged in npm, written in ES6. Il n'y avait pas de façon simple de lire les fichiers d'activités sportives .FIT depuis Javascript, donc je m'y suis penché et j'ai transformé un prototype que j'avais trouvé en bibliothèque moderne, facilement installable avec NPM, écrite en ES6. There was no direct way to parse .FIT activities file from Javascript, so I decided to look into it and turned a prototype I found into a modern library, packaged in npm, written in ES6.
Main developer and maintainer Développeur et mainteneur Hauptentwickler und Betreuer
Repository Repository Repository

WaitButWhy Android

An unofficial Android client for waitbutwhy.com Un client Android non-officiel pour waitbutwhy.com Eine unoffizielle App für waitbutwhy.com

I started this client for this awesome website in order to improve my Android skills. The app was almost finished when I got the answer from the folks at the website that I wasn't allowed to publish it to the Google Play Store. J'ai commencé cette application pour ce très bon site pour m'expérimenter en développement Android. Mais juste avant de la publier sur le Google Play Store, j'ai eu la réponse de l'équipe du site, me l'interdisant. I started this client for this awesome website in order to improve my Android skills. The app was almost finished when I got the answer from the folks at the website that I wasn't allowed to publish it to the Google Play Store.
Main developer and designer Développer et designe Entwickler und Designer
Repository Repository Repository

Mountain biking VTT Mountainbike

Crazy about sports, especially mountain biking, that I’ve practiced since I was 6 in competitions.

Member of the french national mountainbike team VTT Conliège Jura Bassin de Lons-le-Saunier, I'm racing within the Elites category in french national cups, and some UCI international competitions.

Owner of coaching license, I teach to younger riders for my club every saturday afternoon. Fan de sports, et surtout de VTT, que je pratique en compétitions nationales depuis l’âge de 6 ans.

Membre du Team XC VTT Conliège Jura Bassin de Lons-le-Saunier, je roule en Coupes de France dans la catégorie Élites, ainsi que sur quelques courses UCI internationales.

Titulaire d’un brevet fédéral « Entraineur Jeunes » et du PSC1, je suis bénévole le samedi après-midi au sein de mon club. Crazy about sports, especially mountain biking, that I’ve practiced since I was 6 in competitions.

Member of the french national mountainbike team VTT Conliège Jura Bassin de Lons-le-Saunier, I'm racing within the Elites category in french national cups, and some UCI international competitions.

Owner of coaching license, I teach to younger riders for my club every saturday afternoon.
